title: CBL-Scaffolding Integrated Simulation Education for Enhancing Self-Awareness in Science Domains

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary scientific concepts and experience in self-directed learning
context.additional_context: Analyzing real-world science education cases in VR simulation environments, with learners performing activities using personal BYOD devices

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose at least three of their own scientific thinking patterns through CBL (Challenge-Based Learning) cases.
Learners can improve learning strategies by over 80% through scaffolded, stage-based feedback.
Learners can present a self-awareness-based problem-solving process in VR simulation assessments with over 70% completeness.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
